Class CouchDbDataContext

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.metamodel.AbstractDataContext
      org.apache.metamodel.QueryPostprocessDataContext
          org.apache.metamodel.couchdb.CouchDbDataContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasReadTypeConverters, DataContext, UpdateableDataContext
public class CouchDbDataContext
extends QueryPostprocessDataContext
implements UpdateableDataContext

DataContext implementation for CouchDB

materializeMainSchemaTable

protected DataSet materializeMainSchemaTable(Table table,
                                             Column[] columns,
                                             int firstRow,
                                             int maxRows)
Description copied from class: QueryPostprocessDataContext
Executes a simple one-table query against a table in the main schema of the subclasses of this class. This default implementation will delegate to QueryPostprocessDataContext.materializeMainSchemaTable(Table, Column[], int) and apply a FirstRowDataSet if necessary.

Overrides:
materializeMainSchemaTable in class QueryPostprocessDataContext
Returns:

materializeMainSchemaTable

protected DataSet materializeMainSchemaTable(Table table,
                                             Column[] columns,
                                             int maxRows)
Description copied from class: QueryPostprocessDataContext
Executes a simple one-table query against a table in the main schema of the subclasses of this class.

Specified by:
materializeMainSchemaTable in class QueryPostprocessDataContext
Parameters:
table - the table to query
columns - the columns of the table to query
maxRows - the maximum amount of rows needed or -1 if all rows are wanted.
Returns:
a dataset with the raw table/column content.

executeCountQuery

protected Number executeCountQuery(Table table,
                                   List<FilterItem> whereItems,
                                   boolean functionApproximationAllowed)
Description copied from class: QueryPostprocessDataContext
Executes a simple count query, if possible. This method is provided to allow subclasses to optimize count queries since they are quite common and often a datastore can retrieve the count using some specialized means which is much more performant than counting all records manually.

Overrides:
executeCountQuery in class QueryPostprocessDataContext
Parameters:
table - the table on which the count is requested.
whereItems - a (sometimes empty) list of WHERE items.
functionApproximationAllowed - whether approximation is allowed or not.
Returns:
the count of the particular table, or null if not available.

executeUpdate

public void executeUpdate(UpdateScript script)
Description copied from interface: UpdateableDataContext
Submits an UpdateScript for execution on the DataContext. Since implementations of the DataContext vary quite a lot, there is no golden rule as to how an update script will be executed. But the implementors should strive towards handling an UpdateScript as a single transactional change to the data store.

Specified by:
executeUpdate in interface UpdateableDataContext
Parameters:
script - the update script to execute
